body.p: This tab allows you to enter external IDs of your lemma to create links to other external projects and databases. By default a button will be displayed. Click it to add an external ID.

NOTE: Lemmata transferred from the project "Altägyptisches Wörterbuch" display here the ID from the project "Altägyptisches Wörterbuch" in the field External ID. In this case, the field type has the value aaew_wcn. For hieroglpyphic and hieratic lemma, this will be the same as their BTS ID; for demotic lemma, this will be their ID from the TLA (i.e. without the addition of "d" and "m").

ul.li:
Provider: Select the provider (the external project) from the drop-down menu.
If a provider you need is missing, please send a proposal to the BTS team: aegypt1@bbaw.de.
Type: Enter the type of the external ID, if appropriate.

External ID: Enter the external ID here.
Example: The lemma nfr also appears in the Ramses project: http://ramses.ulg.ac.be. Select Ramses as the Provider, and 96274 as the External ID.
Add Identifier: Add another set of information, including the "Provider", "Type", and "External ID".
Remove Widget: This removes the external ID from the lemma.
